Component.Name: Corkscrew_ConfigDB
Component.description: This is the primary (and in this version, the only) database that Corkscrew users. This database will contain all the Farm configuration, site configuration, the file system and the workflows hosted in Corkscrew. You must have one of these deployed to your farm. After you have set up the database using this installation wizard, you can ask your database administrator (DBA) to setup clustering, failover, replication, Always ON and other redundancy and failure-mitigation mechanisms as per your standard operating policies.
